name: Rotten Adventure
description:
This is a game for "$105 Adventure Game Challenge" Game Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/105-adventure-game-challenge

You play as a lonely woman with her daughter who tries to escape from the depressing city together.

All assets are created by me for this game except the font. I created the font for another game.

Note: Windows gives a warning about Godot games since they are not signed. It's not a serious thing and the game is totally clean. I have to find a way to sign my Godot Engine games.
